item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]With the ski pass you have access to all cable cars, lifts and pistes in the ski resort. This means runs on the ski mountains Monte Elmo, Orto del Toro, Croda Rossa, Baranci and the Comelico area. You can also use the lifts in Braies, in the Ski Center Rienza Dobbiaco, in Waldheim/Sesto and on the Kreuzberg.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Daily ski pass" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Morning ski pass" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="3 Day package" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="7 Day package" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo.
Lesson starts at the mountain top at 3 PM.

What to know before you go

  • You can change your reservation by calling (555) 123-4567
  • Lessons are never cancelled because of weather

On the day of your lesson

  • Come ready to put some fun in those fundamentals
  • If you have not picked up your reservation please arrive 30 minutes prior to reservation for adults and 1 hour for children.
  • Bring all your equipment - we'll show you how it all goes together

Rental Equipment

  • If you include it with your ski school package proceed to the ski school for equipment pick up
  • If you book equipment on this website but not as a part of your ski school package, please pick it up at the Sports location you selected prior to coming to your lesson

Prepping for your lesson

  • Get a good nights sleep
  • Drink lots of water
  • Eat a healthy breakfast
  • Don't forget the sunscreen
  • Dress warm and in layers
  • Be sure to wear protective eye wear
  • It's always a good idea to stretch
  *Gratuities for coaches are not a requirement but an appropriate and appreciated gesture. A 15-20% gratuity based on the cost of the lesson will make your coach feel very appreciated and valued.

Did you ski once a few years ago? Or do you want to take your skiing to the next level? Our Pros will assess the abilities of your group and create a lesson plan tailored to your group with unique skills and exercises, with some individual attention. You'll be learning new techniques, cruising past lift lines, finding the mountain hot spots, and meeting some new buddies along the way.

Lesson Benefits

  • Gain the confidence to tackle green terrain
  • Improve on your fundamentals and move on to learning new skills and techniques
  • Learn comfortably at a relaxed pace in a social environment with other like-minded individuals
